short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ugly Christmas Sweater Resources: Shop and Learn about Ugly Christmas Sweaters!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ugly Christmas Sweater extension from UglyChristmasSweater.com!  Whether you want to shop for or learn about Ugly Christmas Sweaters, you can use this extension to take you where you need to go and get your ugly on!
